nodes.text: The VL-25 XT Plasma Core Rifle was a model of blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The VL-25 XT Plasma Core Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer Packs, which were released together on May 4, 2015.
